mapper.select: select C.UserID as user_id, C.HashedPassword as cr_hash, C.PasswordSalt as cr_salt, C.Iterations as cr_iterations from credentials C left join user U on C.UserID = U.UserID where U.Email = #{email}
select C.HashedPassword as cr_hash, C.PasswordSalt as cr_salt, C.Iterations as cr_iterations from credentials C where C.UserID = #{id}
